content: p1 turn heel shortrow 5 sl1 k8 ssk k1 turn heel shortrow 6 sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn 12 14 sts larger size only heel shortrow 7 sl1 k10 ssk turn heel shortrow 8 sl1 p10 p2tog turn - 12 sts all sizes knit across the 12 heel sts pick up 9 11 sts down the side of the heelflap one in each slipped stitch and one in the corner between the flap and the instep work the 18 20 instep stitches in 2x2 ribbing as established pick up 9 11 sts up the final side of the heelflap to mirror the other side - 48 54 sts total knit next 6 sts to the middle of the heel this now your bor position stitches on the needles as follows needle 1 6 heel sts and 9 11 gusset sts needle 2 18 20 instep sts needle 3 9 11 gusset sts and 6 heel sts 2 cozy little toes judy@kaethler com gusset round 1 needle 1 knit to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 2 work across instep sts in ribbing as established needle 3 k1 ssk k to end 2 sts decreased gusset round 2 needle 1 knit needle 2 work in ribbing as established needle 3 knit repeat these two gusset rounds until 34 38 sts remain - 8 9 sts on each of needles 1 and 3 next work only gusset round 2 for 12 16 rounds or until you are approx ½ from the total desired sock length remember to add a few rounds to allow for growth toe set-up round needle 1 knit needle 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 3 knit we now have 16 18 sts on needle 2 and 8 9 sts each on needles 1 & 3 32 36 sts total toe decrease round needle 1 knit to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end 28 32 sts next round knit next round work toe decrease round 24 28 sts next round knit next round work toe decrease round 20 24 sts next round work toe decrease round 16 20 sts cut yarn and graft toe sts together using kitchener stitch sew in yarn ends repeat to make second sock and enjoy seeing those happy cozy little toes tip remember to remove socks before changing poopy diapers oops 3 cozy little toes judy@kaethler com
